articles.title: A popular Vermont ski resort is under new ownership
articles.description:
It was named the most family-friendly ski resort in the East by Ski magazine.

The post A popular Vermont ski resort is under new ownership appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Vermont's most family-friendly ski resort is now under new ownership as of February 2026.
Ski magazine recognized the resort, boosting its appeal to Boston families seeking winter activities.
Local Boston residents may benefit from improved services and packages at the resort.

articles.title: Mass. senators push bill that could allow residents to sue ICE agents
articles.description:
Lawmakers say that the bill is part of a broader effort to push back on the Trump administration's policies.

The post Mass. senators push bill that could allow residents to sue ICE agents appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Massachusetts senators propose a bill allowing residents to sue ICE agents for misconduct.
The bill aims to counteract policies from the Trump administration affecting immigrant rights.
If passed, this legislation could significantly empower Boston residents facing ICE actions.

articles.title: Boston Legacy FC unveils inaugural home uniform, dubbed the ‘First Light’ kit
articles.description:
The jersey features logos of the team's sponsors, and the hem tag on the bottom — two bears holding up a soccer ball — is a nod to the Franklin Park Zoo.

The post Boston Legacy FC unveils inaugural home uniform, dubbed the ‘First Light’ kit appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Boston Legacy FC launches its inaugural home uniform, named the 'First Light' kit.
The kit features logos from team sponsors and a design nodding to Franklin Park Zoo.
Local fans can support the team with merchandise reflecting Boston's cultural landmarks.

articles.title: Patriots’ Stefon Diggs pleads not guilty to assault allegation
articles.description:
The arraignment at Dedham District Court was postponed until after Super Bowl LX so Diggs could play in the NFL championship game.

The post Patriots’ Stefon Diggs pleads not guilty to assault allegation appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Stefon Diggs pleads not guilty to assault charges in Dedham District Court.
Arraignment postponed until after Super Bowl LX for Diggs to participate.
Local fans await outcome as Diggs plays a pivotal role in the Patriots' championship hopes.

articles.title: Six arrested in Springfield drug and gun trafficking busts
articles.description:
State police seized firearms, fentanyl, cocaine, and $63,000 during two coordinated operations.

The post Six arrested in Springfield drug and gun trafficking busts appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: State police arrested six individuals in Springfield for drug and gun trafficking.
Authorities seized $63,000, fentanyl, and cocaine during the coordinated operations.
The bust aims to reduce drug-related violence affecting Boston and surrounding areas.
